sentence.Network_en: The workers often decided to go slow in those days.
sentence.Network_cn: 在那时候工人们经常怠工.

sentence.Network_en: I told the driver to go slow.
There's something wrong with his lungs so he does have to go slow.
sentence.Network_cn: 他的肺部有些毛病,所以他必须减少运动.

PerfectNetExp.exp: 的意思是工厂的工人怠工
PerfectNetExp.abs: Vincent的英语学习博客 ... I think we should go slow. 我们还是慢慢发展吧。 Go-slow 的意思是工厂的工人怠工，以示抗议。 iPad 有.
英语新词汇与常用词汇的翻译(G) -亿城英语 ... go-off 出发 go-slow 怠工的 go-to-meeting 最好的.
go-round 表演, go-slow 消极怠工, go-show 怠工

list.abs: gone_百度百科 ... go it a. [口语] go slow a. (车辆)慢行；慢慢走 go some a. [美国口语].
go的相关词组和例句_百度知道 ... Is there food to  go round? 食物够分配的吗？ go slow 怠工 go under 沉没；淹没.

entry.def: A go-slow is a protest by workers in which they deliberately work slowly in order to cause problems for their employers.

means.word_mean: 1. a form of protest by workers in which they deliberately slow down in order to cause problem from their employers
